name: Igu Aro Nri
description: Igu Aro is a tradition practiced yearly by the Igbo people in Nri in Anaocha LGA, Anambra State. It marks the start of the Igbo traditional New Year and the beginning of the farming season while connecting the Igbo people to their ancestors, present lives, and future.
